extension.description:
This Kodi add-on can be used to watch all video content from VRT NU.
- List all videos alphabetically by program or by category - Watch live streams from Eén, Canvas and Ketnet - Discover recently added content - Browse the online VRT TV guides
[B]This add-on is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, and is not endorsed by VRT.[/B]
